snippet: The Marine Corps’ latest marketing effort will underscore two points: That while no one knows where the next global hot spot will be, the Marines are ready to charge there.
abstract: Marine Corps opens its newest marketing campaign, which will use social media, television commercials and print ads to emphasize the chaotic nature of the world and the fact that the Marines are prepared to go anywhere to help those in need.
lead_paragraph: The Marine Corps’ latest marketing effort will underscore two points: That while no one knows where the next global hot spot will be, the Marines are ready to charge there.
